basics.name: Stéphane Bisinger
basics.label: Software Engineer
basics.summary: Software Engineer on the web and the cloud since year 2000. From Single Page Applications to Streaming Data Pipelines, I love facing tough challenges, finding viable solutions and ensuring the highest level of quality.

work.summary: Software Crafter, trainer and coach for 42talents. Focused on frontend development, web performance, serverless architectures and extreme programming.
highlights: Optimized the performance and SEO of the main website.
Developed a Proof-of-Concept for a web shop with Strapi and a static site generator.
Prepared teaching materials and introductions for workshops.

work.summary: Homegate is one of the biggest marketplaces for properties and apartments in Switzerland.
highlights: Worked on the reengineering of the Product Display Page and Search Alerts.
Introduced new ideas into the teams to improve the effectiveness of our work, such as Pair Programming, Continuous Delivery and Trunk-Based Development
Improved observability of the applications by introducing tools like Datadog and Sentry
Worked on automation of all tasks, including production deployments and quality checks.
Solved complex problems like Server-Side Rendering and Code Splitting in a serverless context.
Helped the team split tasks in small deliverables with fast iterations.
Took care of leading the technical decisions in collaboration with the rest of the team.
Held a course on Webpack for the TX Academy.

work.summary: siroop was an online marketplace for Switzerland
highlights: Worked on the streaming data pipeline for product and price updates from merchants.
Rewrote Lambdas to process category information to simplify code and support additional languages.
Refactored a Flask API to be able to switch between DynamoDB and Elasticsearch as source for data.
Wrote an alternative consumer for product data reading from RabbitMQ.
Took a leading role in the analysis, planning and implementation of the promotion concept.

work.summary: Renuo is a web agency specialized in Ruby on Rails and Angular. Among my duties and accomplishments are:
highlights: The development of a Ruby on Rails and Angular 2 single page application for a big insurance company.
Taking responsibility for all the servers, reorganizing them and promoting a shift towards a cloud/serverless architecture.
Training interns and junior developers through pair programming, live coding and presentations.
